attributes.action: Stop hike in electrical bills for any one with a disability
attributes.background: Put something in place for extra help for disabled for price hikes as can’t help been disabled and most use more electricity

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of electricity, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Provide an energy grant to people with a disability or serious medical condition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610300
